field.name: acknowledgements
field.value: April Carroll Meldrum is an Associate Professor and Associate Dean for Academics at Lincoln Memorial University-Duncan School of Law. Prior to assuming her current position, she was a Juvenile Court Judge. Laura Suzann Hash is the Assistant Dean for Students and Assistant Professor at Lincoln Memorial University-Duncan School of Law. Dean Hash represented hundreds of children as a Guardian ad Litem. Both authors would like to thank Ivy Gardner, Deanna Breeding, Jeff Glaspie, and Professor Melanie Reid for their invaluable assistance on this article.
